   trayodaśo 'yaṃ gītāsu saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||	trayodaSaH ayam gItAsu saFgataH saFgataH satAm ||
   baladevaḥ : adhyāyārtham upasaṃharan taj jñāna phalam āha kṣetreti |	baladevaH : aDyAya arTam upasaMharan taj jQAna Palam Aha kzetra iti |
   kṣetreṇa sahitayoḥ kṣetrajñayor jīveśayor evaṃ mad ukti vidhayāntaraṃ	kzetreNa sahitayoH kzetrajQayoH jIveSayoH evam mad  ukti  viDayA antaram
   bhedaṃ jñāna cakṣuṣā vaidharmya viṣayaka prajñā netreṇa ye vidus	Bedam jQAna cakzuzA vEDarmya  vizaya ka prajQA  netreNa ye viduH 
   tathābhūtānāṃ prakṛteḥ sakāśān mokṣaṃ ca tat sādhanam amānitvādikaṃ ye	taTABUtAnAm prakRteH sakASAt mokzam ca tat  sADanam amAni tva Adikam ye
   vidus te prakṛteḥ paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ para vyomākhyaṃ mat padaṃ yāntīti	viduH te prakRteH param sarva utkRzwam para vyoma AKyam mat  padam yAnti iti
   jīveśau deha madhyasthau tatrādyo deha dharma yuk |	jIveSO deha  maDya sTO tatra AdyaH deha  Darma  yuj |
   badhyate mucyate bodhād iti jñānaṃ trayodaśāt ||	baDyate mucyate boDAt iti jQAnam trayodaSAt ||

   Bhagavadgita 14	Bhagavat gitaH 14
   BhG 14.1	Bhu 14.1
   śrī bhagavān uvāca	SrI  BagavAn uvAca
   paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam |	param BUyas pravakzyAmi jQAnAnAm jQAnam uttamam |
   yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ ||1||	yat jQAtvA munayaH sarve parAm sidDim itas gatAH ||1||
   śrīdharaḥ :	SrIDaraH :
   puṃ prakṛtyoḥ svatantratvaṃ vārayan guṇa saṅgataḥ |	puM prakRtyoH svatantra tvam vArayan guNa  saFgataH |
   prāhuḥ saṃsāra vaicitryaṃ vistareṇa caturdaśe ||	prAhuH saMsAra  vEcitryam vistareNa caturdaSe ||
   yāvat sañjāyate kiñcit sattvaṃ sthāvara jaṅgamam |	yAvat san jAyate kiQcid sattvam sTAvara  jaFgamam |
   kṣetra kṣetrajña saṃyogāt tad viddhi bharatarṣabha || ity uktam | sa ca	kzetra  kzetrajQa  saMyogAt tat vidDi Barata RzaBaH || iti uktam | sa ca
   kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogo nirīśvara sāṅkhyānām iva na svātantryeṇa |	kzetra kzetrajQayoH saMyogaH nirISvara  sAFKyAnAm iva na svAtantryeNa |
   kintu īśvarecchayiveti kathana pūrvakaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇa saṅgo 'sya	kintu ISvara icCayivA iti kaTana  pUrvakam kAraNam guNa saFgaH asya
   sad asad yoni janmasu ity anenoktaṃ sattvādi guṇīkṛtaṃ saṃsāra vaicitryaṃ	sad asat  yoni janmasu iti anena uktam sattva Adi guNIkRtam saMsAra  vEcitryam
   prapañcayiṣyan evambhūtaṃ vakṣyamānam arthaṃ stauti bhagavān paraṃ bhūya	prapaQcayizyan evamBUtam vakzyamAnam arTam stOti BagavAn param BUya
   iti dvābhyām | paraṃ paramātma niṣṭham | jñāyate aneneti jñānam upadeśaḥ |	iti dvAByAm | param paramAtma  nizWam | jQAyate anena iti jQAnam upadeSaH |

   | kathambhūtam | jñānānāṃ tapaḥ karmādi viṣayāṇāṃ madhya uttamam |	| kaTamBUtam | jQAnAnAm tapaH karma Adi  vizayANAm maDye uttamam |
   mokṣa hetutvāt | tad evāha yaj jñātvā munayo manana śīlāḥ sarve | ito	mokza hetutvAt | tat eva Aha yat jQAtvA munayaH manana  SIlAH sarve | itas 
   deha bandhanāt | parāṃ siddhiṃ mokṣam | gatāḥ prāptāḥ ||1||	deha  banDanAt | parAm sidDim mokzam | gatAH prAptAH ||1||
   madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvādhyāye   yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃcit sattvaṃ	maDusUdanaH : pUrva aDyAye  yAvat saMjAyate kiMcid sattvam
   sthāvara jaṅgamam | kṣetra kṣetrajña saṃyogāt tad viddhi [Gītā 13.26] ity	sTAvara  jaFgamam | kzetra  kzetrajQa  saMyogAt tat vidDi [GItAH 13.26] iti 
   uktaṃ tatra nirīśvara sāṅkhyam atinirākaraṇena	uktam tatra nirISvara  sAFKyam ati nirAkaraNena
   kṣetra kṣetrajña saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ vaktavyam | evaṃ kāraṇaṃ	kzetra  kzetrajQa  saMyogasya ISvara aDIna tvam vaktavyam | evam kAraNam
   guṇa saṅgo 'sya sad asad yoni janmasu ity uktaṃ tatra kasmin guṇa kathaṃ	guNa saFgaH asya sad asat  yoni janmasu iti uktam tatra kasmin guNa kaTam
   saṅgaḥ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te badhnantīti vaktavyam | tathā	saFgaH ke vA guNAH kaTam vA te baDnanti iti vaktavyam | taTA
   bhūta prakṛti mokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param ity uktaṃ tatra	BUta  prakRti mokzam ca ye viduH yAnti te param iti uktam tatra
   bhūta prakṛti śabditebhyo guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ syān muktasya ca kiṃ	BUta  prakRti SabditeByaH guNeByaH kaTam mokzaNam syAt muktasya ca kim
   lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyaṃ, tad etat sarvaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ caturdaśo 'dhyāya	lakzaNam iti vaktavyan, tat etat sarvam vistareNa vaktum caturdaSaH aDyAya
   ārabhyate | tatra vakṣyamāṇam arthaṃ dvābhyāṃ stuvan śrotṝṇāṃ	AraByate | tatra vakzyamANam arTam dvAByAm stuvan SrotLNAm
   rucy utpattaye śrī bhagavān uvāca param iti | jñāyate 'nena jñānaṃ	ruci  utpattaye SrI  BagavAn uvAca param iti | jQAyate anena jQAnam
   paramātma jñāna sādhanaṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ para vastu viṣayatvāt | kīdṛśaṃ	paramAtma  jQAna  sADanam param SrezWam para vastu  vizaya tvAt | kIdRSam
   tat ? jñānānāṃ jñāna sādhanānāṃ bahiraṅgāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ madhya uttamam	tat ? jQAnAnAm jQAna  sADanAnAm bahis aFgANAm yajQa AdInAm maDye uttamam
   uttama phalatvāt | na tvam ānitvādīnāṃ teṣām antaraṅgatvenottama phalatvāt	uttama  Pala tvAt | na tvam Anitva AdInAm tezAm antaraFga tvena uttama  Pala tvAt 
   | param ity anenotkṛṣṭa viṣayatvam uktam | uttamam ity anena	| param iti anena utkRzwa vizaya tvam uktam | uttamam iti anena

   jñānam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ punaḥ pūrveṣv adhyāyeṣv asakṛd uktam api	jQAnam aham pravakzyAmi BUyas punar pUrvezu aDyAyezu asakRt uktam api
   yaj jñānaṃ jñātvānuṣṭhāya munayo manana śīlāḥ saṃnyāsinaḥ sarve parāṃ	yat jQAnam jQAtvA anuzWAya munayaH manana  SIlAH saMnyAsinaH sarve parAm
   siddhiṃ mokṣākhyām ito deha bandhanād gatāḥ prāptāḥ ||1||	sidDim mokza AKyAm itas deha  banDanAt gatAH prAptAH ||1||
   viśvanāthaḥ :	viSvanATaH :
   guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu phalair jñeyāś caturdaśe |	guNAH syuH banDakAH te tu PalEH jQeyAH caturdaSe |
   guṇātyaye ciha tatir hetur bhaktiś ca varṇitā ||	guNa atyaye ciha tatiH hetuH BaktiH ca varNitAH ||
   pūrvādhyāye kāraṇaṃ guṇa saṅgo 'sya sad asad yoni janmasu ity uktam |	pUrva aDyAye kAraNam guNa saFgaH asya sad asat  yoni janmasu iti uktam |
   tatra ke guṇāḥ, kīdṛśo guṇa saṅgaḥ, kasya guṇasya saṅgāt kiṃ phalaṃ syāt,	tatra ke guNAH, kIdRSaH guNa saFgaH, kasya guNasya saFgAt kim Palam syAt ,
   guṇa yuktasya kiṃvā lakṣaṇam | kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo mocanam ity apekṣāyāṃ	guNa  yuktasya kiMvA lakzaNam | kaTam vA guNeByaH mocanam iti apekzAyAm
   vakṣyamānam arthaṃ stuvāno vaktuṃ pratijānīte param iti | jñāyate æneneti	vakzyamAnam arTam stuvAnaH vaktum pratijAnIte param iti | jQAyate ænena iti
   jñānam upadeśaḥ param atyuttamam ||1||	jQAnam upadeSaH param atyuttamam ||1||
   baladevaḥ :	baladevaH :
   guṇāḥ syur bandhakās te tu pariceyāḥ phalais trayaḥ |	guNAH syuH banDakAH te tu pariceyAH PalEH trayaH |

   pūrvādhyāye mithaḥ sampṛktānāṃ prakṛti jīveśvarāṇāṃ svarūpāṇi vivicya	pUrva aDyAye miTaH  sampRktAnAm prakRti jIva ISvarANAm svarUpANi vivicya
   jānann amānitvādi dharmair viśiṣṭaḥB prakṛti bandhād vimucyate	jAnan amAni tva Adi DarmEH viSizwaHB prakRti banDAt vimucyate
   bandha hetuś ca guṇa saṅga ity uktam | tatra ke guṇāḥ, kasmin guṇe kathaṃ	banDa  hetuH ca guNa saFgaH iti uktam | tatra ke guNAH, kasmin guNe kaTam
   saṅgaḥ, kasya guṇasya saṅgāt kiṃ phalaṃ, guṇa saṅginaḥ kiṃvā lakṣaṇaṃ	saFgaH, kasya guNasya saFgAt kim PalaM, guNa  saFginaH kiMvA lakzaNam
   kathaṃ vā guṇebhyo muktiḥ ity apekṣāyāṃ vakṣyamāṇam artham	kaTam vA guNeByaH muktiH iti apekzAyAm vakzyamANam arTam
   ātma rucy utpattaye bhagavān stauti param iti dvābhyām |	Atma  ruci  utpattaye BagavAn stOti param iti dvAByAm |
   paraṃ pūrvoktād anyaṃ prakṛti jīvāntargatam eva guṇa viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ	param pUrva uktAt anyam prakRti jIva antargatam eva guNa vizayakam jQAnam

   ito loke param ātma yāthātmyopalabdhi lakṣaṇāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ | yad vā	itas loke param Atma yATAtmya upalabDi  lakzaNAm sidDim gatAH | yat vA
   jñāyate 'neneti jñānam upadeśam, tac ca prāg uktam api bhūyaḥ punar	jQAyate anena iti jQAnam upadeSam, tat ca prAk uktam api BUyas punar 
   vidhāntareṇa vakṣyāmi | tac ca jñānānāṃ tapaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ jñāna sādhanānāṃ	viDa antareNa vakzyAmi | tat ca jQAnAnAm tapaH  praBRtInAm jQAna  sADanAnAm

   BhG 14.2	Bhu 14.2
   idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ |	idam jQAnam upASritya mama sADarmyam AgatAH |

   śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca idam iti | idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upāśrityedaṃ	SrIDaraH : kim ca idam iti | idam vakzyamANam jQAnam upASritya idam

   'pi brahmādiṣu utpādyamāneṣv api notpadyante | tathā pralaye 'pi na	api brahma Adizu utpAdyamAnezu api na utpadyante | taTA pralaye api na
   vyathanti | pralaye duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti | punar nāvartanta ity arthaḥ	vyaTanti | pralaye duHKam na anuBavanti | punar na Avartante iti arTaH

   yathoktam jñānaṃ jñāna sādhanam upāśrityānuṣṭhāya mama parameśvarasya	yaTA uktam jQAnam jQAna  sADanam upASritya anuzWAya mama parameSvarasya
   sādharmyaṃ mad rūpatām atyantābhedenāgatāḥ prāptāḥ santaḥ sarge 'pi	sADarmyam mad   rUpa tAm atyanta aBedena AgatAH prAptAH santaH sarge api

   vināśa kāle na vyathanti ca vyathante na ca līyanta ity arthaḥ ||14.2||	vinASa  kAle na vyaTanti ca vyaTante na ca lIyante iti arTaH ||14.2||
   viśvanāthaḥ : sādharmyaṃ sārūpya lakṣaṇāṃ muktiṃ | na vyathanti na	viSvanATaH : sADarmyam sArUpya  lakzaNAm muktim | na vyaTanti na
   vyathante ||2||	vyaTante ||2||

   sṛji karmatāṃ nāpnuvanti pralaye na vyathante mṛti karmatāṃ ca na yāntīti	sRji karmatAm na Apnuvanti pralaye na vyaTante mRti karmatAm ca na yAnti iti

   viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ ity ādi śrutibhyaś caitad	vizNoH paramam padam sadA paSyanti sUrayaH iti Adi SrutiByaH ca etat 
   avagatam ||2||	avagatam ||2||
   BhG 14.3	Bhu 14.3
   mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham |	mama yoniH mahat brahma tasmin garBam daDAmi aham |

   śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ praśaṃsayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtyedaṃ	SrIDaraH : tat evam praSaMsayA SrotAram aBimuKIkRtya idam
   parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ sarva bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na	parameSvara aDInayoH prakRti puruzayoH sarva BUta utpattim prati hetu tvam na
   tu svatantrayor itīmaṃ vivakṣitam arthaṃ kathayati mameti | deśataḥ	tu svatantrayoH iti imam vivakzitam arTam kaTayati mama iti | deSataH

   sarva bhūtānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ sambhava utpattir bhavati ||3||	sarva BUtAnAm brahma AdInAm samBavaH utpattiH Bavati ||3||
   madhusūdanaḥ : tad evaṃ praśaṃśayā śrotāram abhimukhīkṛtya	maDusUdanaH : tat evam praSaMSayA SrotAram aBimuKIkRtya
   parameśvarādhīnayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ sarva bhūtotpattiṃ prati hetutvaṃ na	parameSvara aDInayoH prakRti puruzayoH sarva BUta utpattim prati hetu tvam na
   tu sāṅkhya siddhāntavat svatantrayor itīmaṃ vivakṣitam artham āha mama	tu sAFKya  sidDAnta vat svatantrayoH iti imam vivakzitam arTam Aha mama
   yonir iti dvābhyām |	yoniH iti dvAByAm |
   sarva kāryāpekṣayādhikatvāt kāraṇaṃ mahat | sarva kāryāṇāṃ	sarva kArya apekzayA aDika tvAt kAraNam mahat | sarva kAryANAm
   vṛddhi hetutva rūpād bṛṃhaṇatvād brahma | avyākṛtaṃ prakṛtis triguṇātmkikā	vRdDi hetu tva  rUpAt bRMhaNa tvAt brahma | avyAkRtam prakRtiH triguNa AtmkikA
   māyā mahad brahma | tac ca mameśvarasya yonir garbhādhāna sthānaṃ tasmin	mAyA mahat brahma | tat ca mama ISvarasya yoniH garBADAna  sTAnam tasmin
   mahati brahmaṇi yonau garbhaṃ sarva bhūta janma kāraṇam ahaṃ bahu syāṃ	mahati brahmaNi yonO garBam sarva BUta  janma  kAraNam aham bahu syAm
   prajāyeya itīkṣaṇa rūpaṃ saṃkalpaṃ dadhāmi dhārayāmi	prajAyeyaH iti IkzaNa  rUpam saMkalpam daDAmi DArayAmi

   BhG 14.17	Bhu 14.17

   BhG 14.18	Bhu 14.18
